title: 1 in 4 finance leaders need 20 or more employees to fully staff revenue cycle department - Becker's Hospital Review
content: 1 in 4 finance leaders need 20 or more employees to fully staff revenue cycle department  Becker's Hospital Review
description: More than 25 percent of finance leaders reported needing to hire more than 20 employees to fully staff their revenue cycle departments, a survey published May 18 found.
